name: ExtensionConfig.Media.Queues.ContentProtectionKey
desc: Configuration details for your service’s content protection key endpoint.

items.name: cks
items.desc: The configuration details of your service’s content protection system.

items.name: hdr
items.desc: The headers to include with requests to this endpoint.

items.name: url
items.desc: The relative path for the client to access the contentProtectionKey endpoint. For more information, see Retrieve an Asset’s Content Protection Key.
